articles.title: 10 hottest (and coldest) Aussie ETFs right now - Motley Fool Australia
articles.description: Let's take a look at the Australian ETFs that are attracting the most investor money. And the ones where shareholders are leaving in droves.
articles.content:
The Australian exchange-traded fund (ETF) industry shows no signs of slowing down, with 3 funds attracting nine-figure amounts from investors last month.
